title: Eco-conscious upcycling of sugarcane bagasse into flexible polyurethane foam for mechanical & acoustic relevance
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,23683-23692
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA04025B, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Esraa A. El-Metwaly, Hadeel E. Mohamed, Tarek M. El-Basheer, Manal T. H. Moselhy, Sonia Zulfiqar, Eric W. Cochran, Ahmed Abdelhamid Maamoun
This study explores the use of sugarcane bagasse (SCB), a byproduct of sugarcane processing, as a bio-filler in the production of flexible polyurethane foam (FPU), focusing on its benefits for both the environment and the economy.
